statements: SELECT * FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_id, case_id, recommendation FROM mediator_reports;
SELECT * FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT mediator_name, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM mediator_reports GROUP BY mediator_name;
SELECT * FROM mediator_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, case_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT report_id, case_id, report_date, mediator_name, recommendation FROM mediator_reports WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT report_id, mediator_name, recommendation FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY mediator_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediator_reports WHERE mediator_name LIKE '%John%' AND recommendation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, case_id, mediator_name FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY case_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(report_id) AS avg_report_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM mediator_reports GROUP BY case_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediator_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_status FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT recommendation_id, recommended_actions FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM recommendations JOIN mediator_reports ON recommendations.report_id = mediator_reports.report_id;
SELECT * FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_status = 'Pending';
SELECT report_id, report_text FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_text, report_date FROM mediator_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT r.recommendation_id, r.recommended_actions, m.report_text FROM recommendations r JOIN mediator_reports m ON r.report_id = m.report_id;
SELECT report_id, report_text, report_date, report_status FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_status = 'Resolved' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, case_id, mediator_name, report_text FROM mediator_reports WHERE case_id = 100
SELECT * FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT case_id, child_name, parent1_name, parent2_name, case_status FROM child_custody_cases WHERE case_status = 'active'
SELECT recommendation_text, recommendation_date FROM recommendations WHERE mediator_id = 5
SELECT report_id, mediator_name FROM mediator_reports WHERE mediator_name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_id, mediator_name, report_text FROM mediator_reports WHERE mediator_name = 'Alice';
SELECT recommendation_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT case_id, child_name, parent1_name, parent2_name FROM child_custody_cases WHERE case_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM child_custody_cases ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM mediator_reports;
SELECT mediator_name, date FROM mediator_reports ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT report_id, mediator_name, case_id FROM mediator_reports WHERE mediator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM custody_disputes WHERE child_name = 'Alice';
SELECT case_id, dispute_reason FROM custody_disputes ORDER BY dispute_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM mediator_reports WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, mediator_name FROM mediator_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT dispute_reason, dispute_date FROM custody_disputes WHERE child_name = 'Alice' OR child_name = 'Bob';
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommended_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY recommended_date ASC;
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_contact FROM assigned_mediators WHERE mediator_specialization = 'Family Law';
SELECT * FROM mediator_reports;
SELECT report_title, report_date, mediator_name FROM mediator_reports WHERE report_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_type FROM mediators ORDER BY mediator_name DESC;
SELECT recommendation_text, recommended_actions, due_date FROM recommendations WHERE due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_title, report_date, mediator_name FROM mediator_reports WHERE mediator_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE due_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT mediator_name, mediator_type FROM mediators ORDER BY mediator_type DESC;
SELECT client_name, status FROM clients INNER JOIN dispute_cases ON clients.client_id = dispute_cases.client_id WHERE status = 'active';
